B.TERP_UPDT_DATE THEN 'U' END MG_MODE ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN CATBTERP B ON B.TERP_CORP_CODE = A.TERP_CORP_CODE AND B.TERP_STND_GUBN = A.TERP_STND_GUBN AND B.TERP_STND_DEGR = A.TERP_STND_DEGR AND B.TERP_PROC_SEQ0 = A.TERP_PROC_SEQ0 AND B.TERP_PROC_GUBN = A.TERP_PROC_GUBN

UPDATE CATBTERP SET TERP_TERM_CODE = #terp_term_code# ,TERP_TON0_CODE = #terp_ton0_code# ,TERP_PLAT_CODE = #terp_plat_code# ,TERP_MASK_YN = #terp_mask_yn# ,TERP_PROC_NAME = #terp_proc_name# ,TERP_NET0_CYTM = #terp_net0_cytm# ,TERP_TINP_YN = #terp_tinp_yn# ,TERP_CAVT = #terp_cavt# ,TERP_PREP_HOUR = #terp_prep_hour# ,TERP_PRSN_CNT0 = #terp_prsn_cnt0# ,TERP_MCHH_CODE = #terp_mchh_code# ,TERP_APPL_GUBN = #terp_appl_gubn# ,TERP_REMK = #terp_remk# ,TERP_UPDT_CMAN = #terp_updt_cman# ,TERP_UPDT_DATE = #terp_updt_date# WHERE TERP_CORP_CODE = #terp_corp_code# AND TERP_STND_GUBN = #terp_stnd_gubn# AND TERP_STND_DEGR = #terp_stnd_degr# AND TERP_PROC_SEQ0 = #terp_proc_seq0# AND TERP_PROC_GUBN = #terp_proc_gubn#
